title: Urbtech Mpire
tagline: Redefining luxury workspaces in South Delhi’s prime business hub.
description: Welcome to Urbtech Mpire, a premium corporate landmark in Okhla, South Delhi. Designed for ambitious enterprises and professionals, this luxurious tower blends elegance, innovation, and functionality, setting a new benchmark for office spaces.
features: Luxurious Office Spaces – Tailored for IT professionals, CAs, and architects.
Modern Infrastructure – RCC/steel structure with high-speed lifts and VRV/VRF AC systems.
Advanced Security – CCTV surveillance, boom barriers, and perimeter security.
Fire Safety – Wet risers, sprinklers, fire hydrants, and detection systems.
Efficient Parking – Multi-level basements and surface parking as per norms.
Landscaped Areas – Plaza with water bodies on the ground and top floors.
High-Speed Connectivity – Intelligent metering system and optic fibre connectivity.
Elegant Finishes – Premium exterior and interior finishes with modern fittings.

title: Urbtech One 27
tagline: A landmark IT parks project by URBTECH,offering world-class infrastructure
description: Welcome to Urbtech One 27, a premium corporate destination in Noida Sector 127. Developed by URBTECH, a premier real estate group known for innovative thinking and world-class technology, this project is designed to enhance the quality of life in its catchment areas. With a versatile portfolio in housing and IT parks, URBTECH brings cutting-edge infrastructure and eco-friendly designs to this landmark development.
features: Prime Location – Seamlessly connected to Delhi, Noida Expressway & Metro.
Premium Office Spaces – Flexible layouts to suit startups, SMEs & enterprises.
Modern Infrastructure – High-speed elevators, power backup, & cutting-edge security.
Business-Friendly Amenities – Conference rooms, cafes, & ample parking.
World-Class Infrastructure – True walk-to-work environment with 24x7 operational support.
Eco-Friendly Design – Rainwater harvesting and energy-efficient systems.
Double Glass Facade – Enhances aesthetics and energy efficiency.
Optic Fibre Connectivity – High-speed internet for seamless operations.
Double Basement Parking – Ample parking space for convenience.
RCC Structure – Designed as per seismic zone requirements for safety.

title: NPX Tower
tagline: A modern business hub in Noida, designed for innovation and growth.
description: NPX Tower, located in Sector 153, Noida, is a state-of-the-art retail and office complex designed by renowned architects DFA. Strategically positioned on the Noida Expressway, it offers a perfect blend of modernity, functionality, and accessibility. With its proximity to residential townships and an upcoming metro station, NPX Tower is the ultimate destination for businesses seeking world-class infrastructure and amenities.
features: Prime Location – Situated on Noida Expressway with easy metro connectivity.
Modern Architecture – Designed by DFA for hi-tech commercial spaces.
Spacious Layout – Ground + 16 floors with a built-up area of 1 million sq. ft.
Diverse Zones – Retail, corporate offices, serviced suites, and food courts.
Double Basement Parking – Ample parking space for convenience.
World-Class Amenities – Includes creative arena, auditorium, gaming zone, and banks/ATMs.
Accessibility – Adjacent to 400 acres of residential townships and upcoming metro station.
Future-Ready – Designed to cater to the evolving needs of modern businesses.

title: Urbtech Trade Centre
tagline: A landmark commercial destination in Noida, redefining modern workspaces.
description: Welcome to Urbtech Trade Centre, an ultra-modern commercial marvel in Sector 132, Noida. Designed for both shoppers and businesses, this iconic development offers a perfect blend of luxury, convenience, and innovation. With its strategic location, world-class infrastructure, and integrated amenities, Urbtech Trade Centre sets new benchmarks for commercial and office spaces.
features: Prime Location – Strategically located on Noida Expressway with high visibility.
World-Class Infrastructure – Centrally air-conditioned, Wi-Fi enabled, and eco-friendly.
Ready-to-Move Offices – Fully equipped service offices and business suites.
Integrated Amenities – Food courts, banks, ATMs, and recreational facilities.
Green Environment – Rainwater harvesting, lush landscaping, and water bodies.
State-of-the-Art Security – CCTV surveillance, access control, and fire safety systems.
Efficient Design – Wide column spans, optic fibre connectivity, and energy-efficient systems.
Recreational Facilities – Club with swimming pool, gym, spa, and snooker tables.

title: NPX IT Suites
tagline: Fully furnished IT suites on Noida Expressway, designed for work, travel, and relaxation.
description: Experience ready-to-move IT suites in Sector 153, Noida, offering seamless connectivity, modern infrastructure, and premium amenities. Designed for IT professionals, these suites feature high-speed Wi-Fi, dedicated lifts, a luxurious club, and a swimming pool. With an exclusive reception area, lounge seating, and a green-certified building, this project redefines commercial workspaces.
features: Prime Location – Strategically located on Noida Expressway with excellent connectivity.
Fully Furnished IT Suites – Ready-to-move workspaces with high-speed Wi-Fi.
Work, Travel & Relax – Integrated with a club, swimming pool, and recreational facilities.
Exclusive Reception & Lounge – Dedicated meeting areas for professionals.
High-Speed Elevators – Four dedicated lifts for seamless movement.
Adequate Parking – Separate lobby and ample car parking space.
Green Building Certified – Award-winning eco-friendly infrastructure.
Branded Eateries – On-site restaurants including Bikanervala and Dominos.
Metro Connectivity – Well-connected to metro and upcoming Jewar Airport.
5-Star Security – Secure entry with separate card access and surveillance.

title: Sanjeevani Homes
tagline: A serene residential plotted development in Faridabad, blending nature with urban living.
description: Sanjeevani Homes offers a unique residential plotted development in Sector 139, Faridabad, spread across 6 acres. Designed for peaceful living, it provides ample space to build your dream home while enjoying modern amenities and seamless connectivity. With a secure gated community, lush green surroundings, and excellent infrastructure, this project is ideal for those seeking a tranquil yet well-connected lifestyle.
features: Prime Location – Well connected to major destinations, just 5 minutes from DMIC Expressway/Faridabad Bypass.
Flexible Plot Sizes – Options for sprawling villas or cozy bungalows to suit diverse needs.
Gated Community – Secured living with controlled access and round-the-clock security.
Lush Green Surroundings – Designed for a peaceful lifestyle amidst nature.
Kids Play Area – Safe and engaging spaces for children to play and grow.
Concrete Paver Roads – Durable and well-planned road infrastructure.
Power Backup – Uninterrupted electricity supply for a hassle-free living experience.
Investment Potential – A promising real estate opportunity with excellent connectivity.

title: Urbtech Hilston
tagline: A township that blends contemporary living with an energized sporty lifestyle.
description: Urbtech Hilston, located in Sector 79, Noida, is a part of the 180-acre Sports City, designed for holistic living. Spread over 6 acres, this township offers a perfect balance of luxury and fitness, featuring 8 luxury towers and an iconic tower with spacious 2/3/4 BHK apartments. With world-class sports facilities, green surroundings, and premium amenities, Hilston redefines modern urban living.
features: Prime Location – Part of Noida's Sports City, offering an active and green lifestyle.
Spacious Apartments – 2/3/4 BHK luxury apartments with airy balconies and double-height lobbies.
Swimming Center – Exclusive pool area for residents.
Fitness & Wellness – State-of-the-art gym, health center, yoga, and meditation zones.
World-Class Sports Facilities – Cricket stadium & academy, badminton, tennis, gymnastics, rock climbing, and multi-purpose playfield.
Indoor & Outdoor Sports – Volleyball, basketball, squash, table tennis, and a 9-hole golf course.
Family-Friendly Amenities – Kids’ play area and recreational spaces.
Seamless Connectivity – Well-connected to major city hubs and urban infrastructure.

title: Urbtech Matrix Tower
tagline: A premium commercial hub offering modern office and retail spaces.
description: Urbtech Matrix Tower, located in Sector 132, Noida, is a prestigious commercial development by Urbtech India Developers. Designed to provide an efficient workspace, it offers skillfully designed office spaces, retail shops, and commercial units. With a well-connected location and essential amenities, Matrix Tower ensures a seamless working environment complemented by nearby schools, hospitals, parks, and shopping centers.
features: Strategic Location – Situated in Sector 132, with easy access to major city hubs.
Modern Infrastructure – 2B+G+8 floors of well-designed commercial spaces.
24Hr Backup Electricity – Uninterrupted power supply for seamless operations.
Wi-Fi Enabled Campus – High-speed connectivity for all businesses.
Advanced Security – 3-tier security system with CCTV monitoring.
Earthquake Resistant – Designed for maximum safety and durability.
Ample Parking – Dedicated car parking for visitors and employees.
Business-Friendly Amenities – Includes ATM, cafeteria, and party area.
Fire Safety – Equipped with an advanced fire-fighting system.
Vaastu Compliant – Designed to promote harmony and prosperity.

title: Urbtech Intellect Park
tagline: A prime commercial address designed for business excellence.
description: Urbtech Intellect Park, the commercial space is spread over an area of 1.26 acres and situated at a prime location of Sector-125. Urbtech Intellect Park is brought to us by the team of Urbtech India. The prime requirement of any business to flourish is its address. The address of Urbtech Intellect Park is one such address in Noida, which can set new goals and raise the standards of your business to reach great heights.
features: 24Hr Backup Electricity – Uninterrupted power supply for seamless operations.
Wi-Fi Enabled Campus – High-speed connectivity for all businesses.
Air Conditioning – Fully air-conditioned workspaces for enhanced comfort.
Rain Water Harvesting – Sustainable water management system.
CCTV Cameras – Comprehensive surveillance for security.
Earthquake Resistant – Designed for structural durability and safety.
3-Tier Security System – Advanced security with CCTV monitoring.
Lifts/Elevators – Efficient vertical mobility across floors.
Covered Car Parking – Ample parking space for employees and visitors.
ATM – On-site banking convenience for businesses.
Party Area – Dedicated space for corporate gatherings.
Fire Fighting System – Advanced fire safety measures.
Cafeteria – Well-equipped dining facilities.
Intercom Facility – Seamless internal communication.
Vaastu Compliant – Designed to promote harmony and success.
